        Calls the constructor with an outPut file and no input file.

        outPutFile - The file in which the contents of the activities will be printed out to.

      • DayPlanner

        public DayPlanner(java.io.File outPutFile,
                  java.io.File inputFile)
        Parameters:
        outPutFile - The output file in which the contents of the day planner will be placed.
        inputFile - The input file from which the day planner will be parsed. Initializes and imports the data from the input file, if it's not null.
